Description:
Detects commandline keywords indicative of potential usge of the tool WinPwn. A tool for Windows and Active Directory reconnaissance and exploitation.


Author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - WinPwn Execution
Query: sourcetype="windows-sysmon" (command="*Offline_Winpwn*" OR command="*WinPwn *" OR command="*WinPwn.exe*" OR command="*WinPwn.ps1*")
